title: Drawing, "Oil study. Oblique view of the southwest part of the ruins of the Temple of Zeus in Baalbek, Syria.", May 1868
medium: Graphite, brush and oil paint on cardboard
description: The six standing columns rise in the right center. Bottom margin showing the creamy grounding color.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oil study. Oblique view of the southwest part of the ruins of the Temple of Zeus in Baalbek, Syria.", May 1868.
May 1868. Graphite, brush and oil paint on cardboard. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-514.
